# AI coding agent guide

- **Stack**: Docusaurus 3.9 (classic preset) with TypeScript config; Node >= 20 and pnpm. React 19 runtime; mermaid diagrams enabled via `@docusaurus/theme-mermaid`.
- **Primary structure**: Docs under [docs/](docs/) use autogenerated sidebar ([sidebars.ts](sidebars.ts)) and category metadata. Blog posts live in [blog/](blog/) with RSS/Atom feeds turned on. Custom React page at [src/pages/index.tsx](src/pages/index.tsx) and feature block at [src/components/HomepageFeatures/index.tsx](src/components/HomepageFeatures/index.tsx); global styles in [src/css/custom.css](src/css/custom.css) and page styles in [src/pages/index.module.css](src/pages/index.module.css).
- **Category policy**: Every folder that appears in the sidebar must include `_category_.json` (see expectations in [configuration.md](configuration.md)). Prefer `generated-index` links for folders; use curated doc links for top-level sections when needed. Keep slugs clean and use `label`/`position` for ordering.
- **Broken links**: `onBrokenLinks: 'throw'` is enforced in [docusaurus.config.ts](docusaurus.config.ts); fix or silence by adjusting paths rather than disabling the check.
- **Theme/config tweaks**: Site metadata, navbar, footer, color mode, and Prism themes are defined in [docusaurus.config.ts](docusaurus.config.ts). Respect the logo/social card assets in [static/img](static/img).
- **Styling**: Infima defaults overridden via CSS variables in [src/css/custom.css](src/css/custom.css). Use CSS modules for page-specific styling; keep selectors scoped.
- **Content authoring**: Use MDX for advanced docs; mermaid diagrams are supported out of the box. Blog options warn on inline tags/authors and untruncated postsâ€”keep frontmatter compliant. Prefer DocCardList or generated indexes for section landing pages per [configuration.md](configuration.md).
- **Local workflows**: `pnpm install`, `pnpm start` for dev server with live reload; `pnpm build` for static output to [build/](build/); `pnpm serve` to preview a build; `pnpm clear` to reset cache; `pnpm typecheck` for TS. Use `pnpm swizzle` only when you intend to customize theme components.
- **Deployment**: Target is Vercel (Git integration; preview deployments per branch, production from main). Keep `baseUrl` set to `/`; adjust for GitHub Pages only if deployment changes.
- **Editing etiquette**: Avoid committing changes in [build/](build/) or other generated assets. Maintain README alignment with commands in [package.json](package.json) and policies in [configuration.md](configuration.md).
- **Content hygiene**: Keep hero/CTA text consistent with `siteConfig.title`/`tagline` in [docusaurus.config.ts](docusaurus.config.ts). Ensure new sections get appropriate `_category_.json` metadata and clean slugs.
- **Common pitfalls**: Do not use browser APIs in config files (Node context). Respect `future.v4` flag; keep dependencies on 3.9-compatible APIs. When adding images, place them under [static/](static/) so they copy through builds.
